name: a Train Game
description:
Olá maquinista!
Este é um jogo desenvolvido para a Ludum Dare game Jam usando Construct 3. Nós orgulhosamente apresentamos "a Train Game" que é um jogo linear com um final impressionante.

-----------------

Hello!!
This game was made using Construct 3 for Ludum Dare's GameJam. We are proud to present you "a Train Game" which is a linear game with an impressive final.


  • A and D to move
  • Spacebar to Jump
  • Q to pick-up items (and your lamp!)
  • E to interact

https://bigassopper.itch.io - Pixel Artist

https://dluxa.itch.io/ - Vector Artist

https://guillherme-simionato.itch.io/ - SFX and Music

https://riccioppo.itch.io - Programmer

~ Palpatine: do it

20/04/2020 ~ 10:00 p.m. Ludum Dare 46
